website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 4040 v5 Turf shoe pleases baseballers and ordinary users alike upon its release. Due to the pair’s versatility, it can be used on a variety of surfaces. Comfort is also great, as the majority of its users find out. The price does not leave one’s wallet bruised, either. Overall, this baseball cleat proves its worth not only on the turf but also on several other surfaces.
pros: Most buyers of the New Balance 4040 v5 Turf baseball cleat say that the pair is comfortable to wear
A significant chunk of commenters state that this New Balance baseball cleat is stylish
Several players indicate that this NB model’s traction is commendable
it works on a number of different surfaces
A couple of shoppers find the price appropriate considering what this baseball cleat offers
Some returning customers share that they would purchase this shoe again and highly recommend it to others
The support delivered by this turf baseball shoe is great
cons: A wearer says that the baseball shoe needs to be broken in thoroughly as it can feel stiff and has a limited bend initially

customer_reviews.title: The shoes run narrow
customer_reviews.text: I got my usual size 8 and the length was fine, my foot was just squished because they are narrow. I ordered an 8 wide because I like the style and feel, hope they are the right size. UPDATE: 8 Wides are basically 8.5's. They were too long but the width was better, I will try the 7.5 Wides and see if that is the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe with lots of style. Son typically wears an 8 or 8.5 depending on brand. Description advised true to size so we ordered 8.5 but had to send back because it does run small. Awaiting arrival of 9 but really cool looking shoe and I’m sure comfort will match the quality NB always delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Jab

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size up from your normal size
customer_reviews.text: Order 1/2 size up. I wear a 12 and they were too small so I got a 12.5 and they fit perfect.. awesome turf shoes..my team is all about them.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne karle

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes.  A litle narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are sharp looking shoes. Comfortable. I would say they definitely run on the narrow side. I'm glad I paid the little extra price difference to get the wide width. I don't normally need wide shoes and I think if I hadn't gotten the wide ones on these, they would have been tight. Length wise, I wear a 12 and they fit like a 12 on the length. Great shoes. I have received many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: RyGuy2484

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Comfy, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I love NB but this style was not for me. It ran small and was very tight, in toe and width. I’m a 16 in other NB but these fit like squeezing into a 15. Very rigid shoe and overall I tried them on and returned. I suppose they’re supposed to be rigid as a turf shoe, and the treads looked great. They did look nice in this color, and I was bummed they didn’t run any larger. Beware they run small!
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Tight but good
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small, I bought a size 10 but should have went either 10 W or a 10.5 Great look and feel, just snug The fabric mesh does absorb moisture and stains though but has cleaned up well
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look! But make sure to order a size larger than you are!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super stylish and fairly affordable. However, I am a size 13 and I needed to order a size 15 to get the correct fit. The shoes are really good but I think the sizes are a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Junky

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended....terrible turfs
customer_reviews.text: Normally New Balance running shoes are comfortable for me, so I thought the turfs would be as comfortable, but no. Worst turfs I have owned, after playing 3 softball games, my heels and big toe hurt and had to repeatedly soak my feet after wearing these....back to Solomon trail shoes.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Stylish AND Comfortable !!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for going to Baltimore Orioles game and walking my dog. I love the comfort of the New Balance turf shoes !!
customer_reviews.author: William Ganz III

customer_reviews.title: Best turf shoes. Nice job NB
customer_reviews.text: Love the new design of the shoe. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ However, the fabric collects dirt and the shoes look dirty quick. ⭐️⭐️ But it’s how they feel and preform. That is what it’s about ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: A Dahl

customer_reviews.title: NARROW
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in wide size and 1/2 size larger than my normal shoe size. These shoes run extremely narrow toe box is small and heel is tight. Amazon was great with return as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Dana F

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I took advice from others and ordered a bigger size than I normally would. They were still way too small.
customer_reviews.author: mcain

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, but run small
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them for coaching both softball and baseball and my kids love that I found shoes in the team colors of purple and black. Note of warning, like all New Balance that I've owned I have to order up half a size. In Nike, adidas, Puma, and everything else I wear a 10.5. In New Balance, I have to go up to an 11. Know that going in, order appropriately, and you'll love these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Blankley

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SHOE
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. This is a great shoe especially for a kid that has had an injury to his foot. Lots of support and gets the job done on the field! I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Coaching Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: Coaching at its finest. Hubby has been wearing these for a few months now. Very light weight, durable and great value for money. They are a wider width than Nike which is great for the hubby. He wears them for all his baseball coaching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Style and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for the shape and colors, but they have also proven very comfortable. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P. Revier

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on you shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only turf shoe my son will wear. Every year he returns to the tried and true NB turf. Fits well, comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: dv

customer_reviews.title: I like them, they I-ight!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of NB’s. They fit as ordered and expected. Now I gotta buy an orange cap to match.
customer_reviews.author: Q ProductionsTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great quality but narrow. I ordered Extra wide and still very narrow. Unusual for NB shoe.
customer_reviews.author: g0k0

customer_reviews.title: Great turf cleats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. They are true to size. Very comfortable. Well made. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Color is exactly as appears in advertisement..
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Appear as advertised. Have not tried them on yet. I ordered a half size larger than dress shoes/boots, as feet swell during activities or as day goes on. Hope I did the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for!! True to size!
customer_reviews.text: My son’s favorite turf!!! He’s a catcher and wears turfs all the time!!! He said they’re very comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: For once ordering shoes on line paid off. Very good quality, lightweight, and easy to put on. Thanks new balance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look amazing on my big husbands feet, he has a large wide foot and these shoes fit perfect and are sturdy and lightweight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good quality and fit exactly as expected. It arrived within the promised shipping time period.
customer_reviews.author: S Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use these for coaching football on a turf field. They’re good. Comfortable to stand in and I can still cut if I need to demonstrate. 4 stars because I’m spoiled by soccer cleats for snugness
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Cabezon

customer_reviews.title: Order up a half size
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to order a half size up and I'm glad I did cause they fit him great
customer_reviews.author: Colbee

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very lightweight, feels like it wont last long and isnt a very durable material. Very flexible shoe. Does look nice design wise.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but try some on first.
customer_reviews.text: I bought theae for the armh acft. I tried some on at a store prior to ordering. I usually wear a 9 in running shoes but had to order a 9.5 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Timmothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but with they were a little wider
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a little wider, but are pretty good for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a turf shoe that fits. I wish that they were solid black as I use the to officiate football.
customer_reviews.author: SkipRef

customer_reviews.title: perfect for practice and turf
customer_reviews.text: got these for my son and he really likes them. light weight
customer_reviews.author: MikeTX

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I purchased these for my husband who coaches our 7 year old sons youth baseball team! Look great with our team colors!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: As the reviews state buy at least a half size up from your usual size.
customer_reviews.text: As the reviews state buy at least a half size up from your usual size. N.B. tend to run narrow in the toes. Other than that these are great. Durable. Using for both Baseball and Golf.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L.

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Size wasn’t accurate. Couldn’t even wear them had to give them away
customer_reviews.author: lashana hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 14 year old, he likes how comfortable they are and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great turf cleats
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she likes them pretty well. Fits comfortable for her wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Check mate

customer_reviews.title: True to it's color
customer_reviews.text: Good support for my feet and love love the colors
customer_reviews.author: netra ninen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. They do run a bit small, so for extra wide feet like mine, I ordered one size up, and they fit perfectly. The New Balance website did not have this size/width/color, but Amazon did. Skol!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Craig

customer_reviews.title: Go for a full size large
customer_reviews.text: The new balance shoes are very comfortable but they run a full size small, i used 9.5 in many brands but i have to purchase 10.5 to get a perfect fit on my feet (a bit wide), the shoes are very good looking. Great for slow pitch softball.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Angelo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my boyfriend and he loved it. He said they were nice and comfortable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Never worn due to corona canceling baseball
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grandson for baseball season. However the corona virus put that on hold. He is finally going to get to play his first tournament this weekend. The shoes I ordered are too small now. They have never been worn is there any way I can return them?
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Have had new balance in the past and they fit great. Many people were commenting on them right away.
customer_reviews.author: ryan pierce

customer_reviews.title: no cushion
customer_reviews.text: There feels like there is no cushion in this shoe. The other issue was as you walk in it the material folds into the toe and compacts around the toes.
customer_reviews.author: 4gotn1

customer_reviews.title: I love these dtyle of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wore it for the first time yesterday. The shoes was very comfortable. I will be buying some of the other colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's 4040v5 Turf
customer_reviews.text: These are a wild print, so if you like "crazy" these are for you. Haven't worn them yet outside-however I'm using them to Coach-not play.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Nowakowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice design. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A little tight at first but after wearing them for an hour or so they feel great. Traction is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size too small
customer_reviews.text: They are very fashionable but runs half size small. I was expecting true to size from previous buys of the same brand but had to go up a size due to material deference.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: I stand all day
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. I wear for work. Durable snd supportive.
customer_reviews.author: bisk

customer_reviews.title: Good turf shoe
customer_reviews.text: New Balance always run a bit snug for me so ordered one size bigger. nice shoe used for speed and agility class on turf grip is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: steven main

customer_reviews.title: Good for yard work.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why this is a baseball shoe, but they are comfortable. They work well for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: David Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are way small. I ordered a 14. What I received said 14, but was closer to a 11!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great turf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these for baseball! Comfortable and works well on dirt or grass.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Caroscio

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Every pair of New Balance shoes I have ever bought have been a 10.5. I think these are a hair too small because they are Turf Shoes. I am going to return them and get the right size for sure. The shoes are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jaggie

customer_reviews.title: Get the Wides!
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish and comfy. I reccomend getting the wides, especially if you have odd feet.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Dirty shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I received dirty shoes! What the heck!! No clue how they feel or hold up. Just know that they have been worn before.
customer_reviews.author: Popeye63

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: really like the comfort of the shoes and at the right price. was deciding to try a different style of shoe this time and so have been very pleased with my choice
customer_reviews.author: darwin stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bring manufacturing back home !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 9.5 so I ordered a 9.5 wide. Could barely get it on my foot. Whatever happened to made in America? Profits over customer satisfaction and jobs!!
customer_reviews.author: EL -13

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: Majority of the baseball fields are being renovated into turf fields
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The shoes was what I ordered and they came on time
customer_reviews.text: This item will be used at a softball tournament this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Walker

customer_reviews.title: Best Turf Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these perform. I can run faster due to the light weight and comfortable fit. Only brand and style I will were from no on.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Graham

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: It said it was a wide and was extremely narrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Definitely would recommend these. Lots of compliments as well. Fresh looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Very good support on artificial turf.
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for coaching baseball and teaching lessons on turf. They are comfortable and are supportive of my back when on turf for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Get a side larger I officiate high level matches and would recommend that to all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend for wide size
customer_reviews.text: The wide sizes are not wide at all.. shouldn't even be advertised as wide
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fits great
customer_reviews.text: Softball. I have a wide foot and this shoe and all NB shoes fit me great, it is the only shoe I own.
customer_reviews.author: Mike 18

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size bigger than you think you need
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits a little tighter than expected at first but has loosened up and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bravin

customer_reviews.title: Great Turfs
customer_reviews.text: New Balance are the best for baseball and softball. I use these for coaching. Great feel!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 4040v5 Turf Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description: The 4040v45 turf is our most dizzying so far. Functional and aesthetically progressive.
feature_bullets: Recommended surface as lawn and low upper height.
Not water resistant and synthetic fabric.
